data.text: Monto dwom mma Awurade, na monkamfo ne din;
Awurade yɛ kɛseɛ na ɔfata ayɛyie;
Anyame a wɔwɔ aman foforɔ so yɛ ahoni bi kwa,
Momfa mma Awurade, Ao amanaman mmusuakuo,
Momfa animuonyam ne din a ɛfata mma Awurade;
Monsɔre Awurade wɔ ne kronkronyɛ fɛfɛ mu;
Monka nkyerɛ aman nyinaa sɛ, “Awurade di ɔhene.”
Momma ɔsorosoro ani nnye, na asase nni ahurisie;
momma mfuo ne so nneɛma nyinaa mmɔ ose.
wɔbɛto dwom wɔ Awurade anim, ɛfiri sɛ ɔreba,
